Package com.google.glass.samples.waveform

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BioSharedPreferences  
    BuildConfig  
    GlassPreferences  
    Global
    Stores all the variables that will be static during runtime
    IntentIntegrator
    A utility class which helps ease integration with Barcode Scanner via Intents.
    IntentResult
    Encapsulates the result of a barcode scan invoked through IntentIntegrator.
    R  
    R.attr  
    R.color  
    R.dimen  
    R.drawable  
    R.id  
    R.layout  
    R.menu  
    R.raw  
    R.string  
    R.xml  
    WaveformActivity
    An activity that receives EDA input from the Q-sensor and displays a visualization of that data as a waveform on the screen.
    WaveformView
    A view that displays sensor data on the screen as a waveform, and allows browsing through head movements.
